fields.label: Print Format Help
fields.options:
C# Print Format Help

Introduction

C# Print Formats allow you to define print layouts using C# code. This enables you to create dynamic and customizable print formats that can interact with the data in your ERPNext application.

In C# print formats, you can utilize various libraries and frameworks to enhance the functionality and appearance of your print outputs.

References

  1. C# Documentation
  2. Collections in C#
  3. System.Console Class

Example


using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;

public class PrintFormat
{
    public void GenerateInvoice(dynamic doc)
    {
        Console.WriteLine("Invoice: " + (doc.select_print_heading ?? "Invoice"));
        Console.WriteLine("Customer Name: " + doc.customer_name);
        Console.WriteLine("Date: " + doc.get_formatted("invoice_date"));

        Console.WriteLine("Items:");
        foreach (var row in doc.items)
        {
            Console.WriteLine($"Sr: {row.idx}, Item Name: {row.item_name}, Qty: {row.qty} {row.uom}, Rate: {row.get_formatted("rate", doc)}, Amount: {row.get_formatted("amount", doc)}");
        }
    }
}

Common Functions

doc.get_formatted("[fieldname]", [parent_doc]) Get document value formatted as Date, Currency, etc. Pass parent doc for currency type fields.
frappe.db.get_value("[doctype]", "[name]", "fieldname") Get value from another document.
Console.WriteLine("[message]") Prints the specified message to the console output.
